snippet: Performance in schools has improved despite the state’s low per-student spending, but Texas teachers earn less money than their peers elsewhere and face other financial strains.
lead_paragraph: Performance in schools has improved despite the state’s low per-student spending, but Texas teachers earn less money than their peers elsewhere and face other financial strains.

headline.main: Commitment in Texas to Fiscal Restraint Adds Burden for Education
headline.print_headline: In a State Committed to Fiscal Restraint, Added Burdens for Education
